item.title: Slow Food
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: Slow Food, founded in 1986, is an international organization whose aim is to protect the pleasures of the table from the homogenization of modern fast food and life. Through a variety of initiatives, it promotes gastronomic culture, develops taste education, conserves agricultural biodiversity and protects traditional foods at risk of extinction. (Link courtesy of my brother, Steve)
